mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVERSE_LABEL ( ID, LABEL_TYPE, CREATE_SITE_CODE, CREATE_SITE_NAME, RECEIVE_SITE_CODE, RECEIVE_SITE_NAME, CREATE_USER, CREATE_USER_CODE,OPERATOR_NAME, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, PRINT_NUM, yn) VALUES ( SEQ_REVERSE_LABEL.NEXTVAL, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createSiteCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createSiteName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiveSiteCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{receiveSiteName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUserCode,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{operator_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SYSDATE, #{printNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, 1)
